lead_paragraph: Deanna Nolan scored 26 points and Katie Smith added 14 for the Detroit Shock, which clinched a playoff spot with an 83-69 victory over the Liberty in a W.N.B.A. game in Auburn Hills, Mich.
snippet: Deanna Nolan scored 26 points and Katie Smith added 14 for the Detroit Shock, which clinched a playoff spot with an 83-69 victory over the Liberty in a W.N.B.A. game in Auburn Hills, Mich.
